evidence.claim: Avid Health utilizes AWS services for data storage and processing.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health information.
Avid Health employs FHIR APIs for interoperability in electronic health data exchange.
Integration with EHR systems using HL7 standards is mentioned in their developer documentation.
The company implements cloud-based integration patterns for efficient data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse integration found.
